KnowledgeBase.Title: Example Directory compareNE 005
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: compare compareEQ compareLE compareGE compareLT compareGT

Example.Description: These examples use the compareNE function to compare two Directories and return the Boolean value, true or false. The corresponding keys and values of each Directory are compared to determine whether one Directory is equal to the other.

Syntax.Note: The first Directory is lesser than the second Directory.
